content:
Is there documentation on what names crates.io allows? I think they allow:

  • First character is_alphabetic.
  • All characters is_alphanumeric or _ or -.
  • All characters are ASCII.
  • Max 64 characters.
  • Rejects reserved crate names (stored in database).

But I was wondering if there is a authoritative link for this?
There's also some things about windows special file names like NUL. And if that's a policy then probably case-insensitive too.
